name: Snooker Nation Championship
description: Dream of playing in the World Snooker Championship? Indulge your snooker fix, and play along with the televised version of the sport with Snooker Nation...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows: 64-Bit Windows 7 Service Pack 1, or Newer: 64bit Processor: 2 GHz Dual-Core 64-bit CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX10 Compatible GPU with 1 GB Video RAM DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows: 64-Bit Windows 7 Service Pack 1, or Newer: 64bit Processor: 3.3Ghz Quad-Core Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 4GB Video RAM DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space
